Oct. 2, 2010 D West Wales BBA Contest (Second Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-second-section
None
Ammanford, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Percussion Section (Briton Ferry). Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100. 5 bands competed.
Oct. 5, 2010, 7:39 a.m. July 4, 2020, 11:50 a.m.
1 City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Gareth Ritter Purcell Variations [Downie]
2 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Glyn Davies
3 Lewis Merthyr Band Gareth Pritchard Chorale and Variations [Lucas]
4 Briton Ferry Band Christian Jenkins
5 Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden
